Question: What does Trava offer?
GroundTruths: ['TRAVA offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business. TRAVA also offers the credit score function based on financial data on-chain analysis as a useful tool that reduces risk and increases profits for all users. ']
RetrievedResults: ['Register **Registration Error** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', 'A Smart Wallet: Create your smart wallet here if you haven‚Äôt had it yet: https://app.trava.finance/station Next, you just need to do a simple thing: asking TravaGPT to deposit/ stake with Smart Wallet in Trava Finance lending pool/ Trava Staking and Trava Finance. ‚ö†Ô∏è Especially, remember to ensure this NOTE: When you stake/ deposit in Trava pools/vaults, you‚Äôll have your own APR reward and PLUS 20% of the APR. HOWEVER: ‚úÖ Leaving the reward in the vault until the campaign ends, you will earn an extra 20% APR. ‚ùå Withdrawing the reward before the campaign ends, you will NOT receive that extra 20% APR. Sixth Question: Many users are still confused a little bit about the Rewards of the campaign, especially the 20% APR PLUS. Could you give us a clear explanation for those rewards? The 20% APR PUS means that you will have an additional 20% of the APR you have when depositing/staking in Trava pool/vault. To make things simple, I will give you the formula for this reward: APR + (20% * APR) ** For example, when you stake tokens in Trava Staking and have 4.5% APR. In this campaign, you will not only have that 4.5% APR but also an additional 20% of that APR, which is 0.9% Remember that you also have Extra Rewards and Lottery Rewards, alongside the 20% APR PLUS. üëâ So let‚Äôs join us and get yourself in this LEADERBOARD: Answers community questions The AMA also provided insightful answers to the community‚Äôs questions on Twitter and during the event on Telegram. Twitter Questions: : ‚ÄúCould you explain how TravaGPT V3.0 enhances the user experience within the TRAVA ecosystem, particularly in navigating decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms? What specific features does TravaGPT V3.0 offer to users, and how does it streamline interactions across different DeFi protocols on the TRAVA platform?‚Äù Because I‚Äôve provided the information that covered the question ‚ÄòWhat specific features does TravaGPT V3.0 offer to users?‚Äù. So I‚Äôll answer the rest. TravaGPT V3.0 introduces advanced features designed to enhance the user experience within the TRAVA ecosystem, especially in navigating decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms and streamlining interactions across various DeFi protocols on the TRAVA platform: ‚úÖ Execute DeFi applications using natural language. ‚úÖ Access everything in one place without needing to visit individual applications to perform transactions. : ‚ÄúHow are rewards on the leaderboard calculated? Can you give more information about the lottery prize?‚Äù Firstly, regarding the leaderboard, it displays the rewards users have earned after converting from the 20% APR PLUS. You can take a look at the formula I‚Äôve mentioned to understand how it is calculated: APR + (20% * APR)‚Äù Secondly, regarding the Lotter prize, this is a reward that will be distributed randomly to lucky winners. But only participants in this campaign (who appear on the Leaderboard) can join this Lottery. : ‚ÄúHow can I claim rewards using TravaGPT in Trava Staking? and What are the advantages of using TravaGPT for governance actions in Trava?‚Äù To claim rewards in Trava Staking, you just need to enter TravaGPT and type the order: ‚ÄúI want to claim rewards in Trava Staking‚Äù TravaGPT will provide you with a form like this to let you give more details of the order. With just a few clicks, TravaGPT will automatically complete the transactions for you. As you can see, the usual process with many steps to perform actions in Trava has been reduced to just a few clicks with TravaGPT. This means you can save time and enjoy a more convenient experience when using TravaGPT for actions in Trava Governance. Additionally, you can currently earn an extra APR by creating locks in Trava Governance through TravaGPT. The campaign will only last for around 1 month, so let‚Äôs join it soon! Telegram Questions: First Question ‚Äî : How does TravaGPT V3.0 contribute to the overall ecosystem of Trava Finance beyond its AI chatbot capabilities? Our product serves as an all-in-one gateway to the Trava Finance ecosystem , allowing users to access any features of Trava Finance naturally through human language. This seamless integration means you can manage your cryptocurrency activities with ease, without needing to navigate complex interfaces. Furthermore, TravaGPT is evolving into a comprehensive personal assistant for your cryptocurrency journey. Whether you need real-time market updates, personalized investment advice, or detailed transaction histories, TravaGPT is designed to provide tailored support for all your needs. Our goal is to simplify your experience, making the Trava Finance ecosystem more accessible and user-friendly than ever before. Second Question ‚Äî : What is the difference between Trava GPT and chat GPT? What makes Trava GPT feel superior? TravaGPT and ChatGPT are both Generative Pre-trained Transformers (GPT), but they serve different purposes. While ChatGPT is a general-purpose model, TravaGPT is specifically designed to integrate deeply with the Trava ecosystem and the blockchain domain . This specialization allows TravaGPT to inherit various features of the Trava Finance platform, such as lending pools, staking, and more. Moreover, with its robust big data backbone, TravaGPT delivers real-time data and valuable insights , enhancing the user experience. The ultimate goal of TravaGPT is to evolve into a personalized assistant for each user, providing tailored support and guidance throughout their cryptocurrency journey. Question: How to interconnect with Trava protocol?
GroundTruths: ['In order to interconnect with Trava protocol, you need to deposit your asset into lending pools. After depositing, you will earn passive income, this income is based on the market borrowing demand. Additionally, you can also borrow by using your deposited assets as collateral.']
RetrievedResults: ['Register **Registration Error** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', "Brief description of Trava: TRAVA is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending. While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, TRAVA offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business. TRAVA also offers the credit score function based on financial data on-chain analysis as a useful tool that reduces risk and increases profits for all users. We build our solutions on TRAVA.FINANCE whose smart contracts are deployed on BSC network, so the speed of transactions, gas fees, and robustness depend on BSC network. However, in the near future, we will allow cross-chain lending in our platform. Please join the the Trava team and members of the community look forward to helping you understand and use Trava. Why should we trust Trava? : Trava Protocol has been audited and secured internally, by third parties (Hacken, Certik) and even Community Checks. Check https://docs.trava.finance/security/ for more information. How to interconnect with Trava protocol? : In order to interconnect with Trava protocol, you need to deposit your asset into lending pools. After depositing, you will earn passive income, this income is based on the market borrowing demand. Additionally, you can also borrow by using your deposited assets as collateral. Do I need to pay fees to interconnect with Trava protocol? : Interacting with the protocol requires transactions and so transaction fees for BSC Blockchain usage, which depend on the network status and transaction complexity. Where are my deposited tokens stored? : After depositing, your deposit funds are stored in a smart contract. The code of the smart contract is public, open-source, formally verified, and audited by third-party auditors. You can withdraw your funds from the pool back to your wallet. What does Trava do to avoid risk? : Risk can occur in smart contracts not only on BSC but also on other networks. To ensure the safe, we have several strategies as follows: * Auditing code performed by third parties: we have been audited by Hacken and Certik. We are contacting others. * Audit internally our code. We have a strong team with high-security skills. * Community check: we will organize hackathon events and reward programs that encourage the community to detect risks. What are the TRAVA token and its utility? : We issue TRAVA tokens based on Binance smart chain's BEP-20 standard; the total supply is 5 billion. These TRAVA tokens can be used in: * Reward: Pool owners can set up rewards paid by TRAVA token. Thus, lending pool depositors will earn rewards by TRAVA token. * Collateral and lending: Users can use TRAVA as mortgages. The users also loan TRAVA. * Payment for lending fees: Users can pay pool lending fees by TRAVA. * Payment for pool management: Pool owners can pay for the pool creation, update (e.g., pool parameters, add/remove tokens, ‚Ä¶), and pause by TRAVA. * Payment for auction deposits: in the NFTs auction process, TRAVA can be used as a locked asset. * Payment for auction organization: To perform all auction actions for NFT, the NFT‚Äôs owners (auction organizers) can pay the auction fees by TRAVA. * Staking for a data validator: To store credit data stored on the knowledge graph chain, the data must be confirmed by validators. The process is built up to eliminate redundant, unnecessary, and insecure data. The knowledge graph data validators stake by TRAVA. * Staking to participate in the governance process: TRAVA.FINANCE will become a community solution, thus the TRAVA.FINANCE‚Äôs rules are elected by participants, who hold TRAVA‚Äôs token. Tokenomics? : Documentation on tokenomics and governance is available in the White Paper Does Trava have a Mobile App? : Be careful, we don‚Äôt provide any downloaded applications for mobile. Trava also never carries advertisements on any social media or search engine. Please stay away from those adverts if you see, it is a scam. In addition, Trava Protocol would not ask for your seed passphrase ever. Chart: Go to dextool: **** Is there any group where I can discuss about price of Trava? : If you want to discuss about prices, or any information related to trading, please join the following group: Trava Road map: You can find the Road map on website of Trava: https://trava.finance/roadmap Where can I get more information and resources of Trava? : Feel free to refer to the White Paper for a deeper dive into Trava Protocol mechanisms. If you still have any questions or issues, feel free to reach the Trava team in: | | | | NextStaking/Depositing & Earning Last updated 1 year ago Was this helpful?", 'Login √ó **Login Unsuccessful** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', 'Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization - Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes & improvements as a way of participating in the protocol‚Äôs decision-making process. In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts. * Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels. * DAO Committee: The entrusted individuals in the Trava community to submit proposals after a thorough review with discussion & feedback. * Security Advisory Board: The guardian for the protocol‚Äôs security when some malicious actions are aimed at the protocol or in unexpected events. * Governance Portal & Smart contracts: The autonomous ‚ÄúHand of the King‚Äù consists of governance contracts for on-chain voting and multiple timelocks governing and automating the changes & updates of Trava Ecosystem‚Äôs smart contracts. That keeps the governance process public and transparent to everyone. NextDAO Last updated 1 year ago', '1. Home 2. If you still have any questions or issues, feel free to reach the Trava team in: | | | | NextStaking/Depositing & Earning Last updated 1 year ago Was this helpful?", 'Login √ó **Login Unsuccessful** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', '2024 Overview of Trava Finance Ecosystem: Published in 5 min readAug 28, 2024 Share In the ever-growing process, Trava has introduced many new products and updates in 2024, such as TravaGPT, Trava Station, etc. To help you easily navigate through our current ecosystem, we provide a detailed overview of Trava Finance in 2024. The overview of Trava ecosystem At present, Trava Finance aims to become an AI-driven Lending Station that provides cross-chain lending pools and other financial services, empowered by AI technology and automation. With that being said, we want to bring users the most convenience in the DeFi space and complete decentralization in Web3. Currently, there are 6 major products in Trava Finance: 1Ô∏è‚É£ TravaGPT : An AI chatbot of Trava. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Station : A hub that brings together the short ways to use all Trava products. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Smart Wallet: an advanced crypto wallet for Web3 users. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Lending Market : A marketplace protocol providing user-owned lending pools. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Staking : A staking protocol to deposit $TRAVA, $rTRAVA or $BNB to earn interest. 6Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Governance : A governance system, allowing users to vote for major decisions of Trava. Let‚Äôs dive into our ecosystem in this article! TravaGPT TravaGPT is an AI chat tool developed by Trava team that helps enhance user experience and navigate our DeFi products more easily. After a process of development, TravaGPT has reached version 3.0 , incorporating more powerful functions than a mere chatbot. With TravaGPT, you just need to tell it what you want to know or to do, it will provide you not only useful information but also complete the actions for you. Currently, it has 3 major features: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Ask anything in Web3 2Ô∏è‚É£ Talk anywhere on Trava 3Ô∏è‚É£ Support DeFi actions in pools or vaults on Trava Finance Feature highlights of TravaGPT TravaGPT will soon be available on Telegram, a popular platform among Web3 enthusiasts. By expanding to Telegram, we aim to offer users a more convenient way to access TravaGPT and a more user-friendly interface. Trava Station Trava Station serves as a center of Trava Finance, aiming to help users in the Trava ecosystem have a more comfortable experience, saving them time and money when making transactions. With Trava Station, instead of having to move between dApps and platforms to perform actions, you can combine them all together in one transaction. The user experience will be increased as you can reduce interaction time and gas costs compared to when doing separate actions. Let‚Äôs see how you can aggregate multiple actions in one transaction and how much gas fees you can save in the picture below. Save more with Trava Station At present, Trava Station has 6 features: ‚û°Ô∏è Freight : Allows users to execute the sequence of actions according to their own demands. ‚û°Ô∏è Tramlines : Provides a list of pre-made shortcuts to do common actions. ‚û°Ô∏è Junction : Allow users to pre-set transactions to be auto-executed when the conditions are met. ‚û°Ô∏è Portfolio : A real-time report that keeps track of all your activities and assets in Trava Station. ‚û°Ô∏è Analytics : Get real-time analysis of the market as well as user preference in Trava Finance. ‚û°Ô∏è Recommendations : Provide a thorough analysis and prediction of DEXs‚Äô parameters. Smart Wallet Smart Wallet is an advanced digital tool that relies on smart contracts, which are only created and owned by the user. Setting apart from other normal wallets, it eliminates the need for private keys or seed phrases. Using a smart wallet offers more advantages for users: * Save fees and streamline transaction process : They enable a smoother DeFi experience by combining multiple transactions into one, reducing transaction fees. * Enhanced user experience and privacy : Smart Wallets offer convenience while improving security, appealing to both new and experienced users by utilizing smart contracts to reduce dependence on private keys. * Additional features and security : Smart Wallets can support multi-signature transactions, add extra layers of security through app authentication, limit daily transaction amounts, and prevent potential errors or theft. Smart Wallet is incorporated in Trava Station and TravaGPT to optimize DeFi actions for users in Trava Finance. Specifically, with Trava Station, your assets are temporarily moved to a Smart Wallet to execute all your actions in a single transaction, making the process smoother. After the actions are completed, your assets are returned to your main wallet (like Metamask or Trust Wallet). To have your own Smart Wallet, you just need to connect your wallet to Trava Finance and go to the Freight tab of Trava Station to create it. Trava Lending Market This is the first lending market that allows users to not only deposit, and borrow assets, but also create and manage their own lending pools. Trava lending system consists of the Trava lending pool and 7 user-owned pools. Trava pool supports around 10 types of assets across 2 different blockchains ( BSC and Ethereum ), while the user-owned pools offer limitless possibilities based on user creativity and specific needs. The lending pools on Trava Lending Market Trava Staking This is a staking protocol that allows users to deposit Trava Finance‚Äôs tokens ($TRAVA/ $rTRAVA) and BNB Chain‚Äôs token ($BNB). Users will then receive corresponding rewards based on their deposit and annual percentage rate (APR) of the staking vaults. Currently, there are three available vaults in Trava Staking which are shown in the picture below. The available staking vaults of Trava Finance Trava Governance Trava Finance also aims to apply the DAO model to the entire system with , which allows users to propose and vote on changes to the ecosystem. Users can stake their TRAVA, rTRAVA, TRAVA/BNB for a period of time and receive veTRAVA ‚Äî voting power, which can be exchanged on veTRAVA Marketplace. The mechanism of Trava Governance ** About Trava.Finance ** Trava Finance is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending, currently on the way to become an AI-driven Lending Station. We provide both lending pools like normal approaches, and a more flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own pools. Applying AI technology and automation to our products, Trava Finance aims to bring users the most convenience in the DeFi space and complete decentralization in Web3. Trava Finance is deployed on the Binance Smart Chain and allows for lending with BSC tokens first; we then enable cross-chain lending with various tokens on Ethereum and other blockchain networks. RetrievedResults: ['Register **Registration Error** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', "Brief description of Trava: TRAVA is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending. While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, TRAVA offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business. TRAVA also offers the credit score function based on financial data on-chain analysis as a useful tool that reduces risk and increases profits for all users. We build our solutions on TRAVA.FINANCE whose smart contracts are deployed on BSC network, so the speed of transactions, gas fees, and robustness depend on BSC network. However, in the near future, we will allow cross-chain lending in our platform. Please join the the Trava team and members of the community look forward to helping you understand and use Trava. Why should we trust Trava? : Trava Protocol has been audited and secured internally, by third parties (Hacken, Certik) and even Community Checks. Check https://docs.trava.finance/security/ for more information. How to interconnect with Trava protocol? : In order to interconnect with Trava protocol, you need to deposit your asset into lending pools. After depositing, you will earn passive income, this income is based on the market borrowing demand. Additionally, you can also borrow by using your deposited assets as collateral. Do I need to pay fees to interconnect with Trava protocol? : Interacting with the protocol requires transactions and so transaction fees for BSC Blockchain usage, which depend on the network status and transaction complexity. Where are my deposited tokens stored? : After depositing, your deposit funds are stored in a smart contract. The code of the smart contract is public, open-source, formally verified, and audited by third-party auditors. You can withdraw your funds from the pool back to your wallet. What does Trava do to avoid risk? : Risk can occur in smart contracts not only on BSC but also on other networks. To ensure the safe, we have several strategies as follows: * Auditing code performed by third parties: we have been audited by Hacken and Certik. We are contacting others. * Audit internally our code. We have a strong team with high-security skills. * Community check: we will organize hackathon events and reward programs that encourage the community to detect risks. What are the TRAVA token and its utility? : We issue TRAVA tokens based on Binance smart chain's BEP-20 standard; the total supply is 5 billion. These TRAVA tokens can be used in: * Reward: Pool owners can set up rewards paid by TRAVA token. Thus, lending pool depositors will earn rewards by TRAVA token. * Collateral and lending: Users can use TRAVA as mortgages. The users also loan TRAVA. * Payment for lending fees: Users can pay pool lending fees by TRAVA. * Payment for pool management: Pool owners can pay for the pool creation, update (e.g., pool parameters, add/remove tokens, ‚Ä¶), and pause by TRAVA. * Payment for auction deposits: in the NFTs auction process, TRAVA can be used as a locked asset. * Payment for auction organization: To perform all auction actions for NFT, the NFT‚Äôs owners (auction organizers) can pay the auction fees by TRAVA. * Staking for a data validator: To store credit data stored on the knowledge graph chain, the data must be confirmed by validators. The process is built up to eliminate redundant, unnecessary, and insecure data. The knowledge graph data validators stake by TRAVA. * Staking to participate in the governance process: TRAVA.FINANCE will become a community solution, thus the TRAVA.FINANCE‚Äôs rules are elected by participants, who hold TRAVA‚Äôs token. Tokenomics? : Documentation on tokenomics and governance is available in the White Paper Does Trava have a Mobile App? : Be careful, we don‚Äôt provide any downloaded applications for mobile. Trava also never carries advertisements on any social media or search engine. Please stay away from those adverts if you see, it is a scam. In addition, Trava Protocol would not ask for your seed passphrase ever. Chart: Go to dextool: **** Is there any group where I can discuss about price of Trava? : If you want to discuss about prices, or any information related to trading, please join the following group: Trava Road map: You can find the Road map on website of Trava: https://trava.finance/roadmap Where can I get more information and resources of Trava? : Feel free to refer to the White Paper for a deeper dive into Trava Protocol mechanisms. If you still have any questions or issues, feel free to reach the Trava team in: | | | | NextStaking/Depositing & Earning Last updated 1 year ago Was this helpful?", 'Login √ó **Login Unsuccessful** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', 'To make the game easier, could you give some suggestions for the community, Mr. Thang? Mr. Thang Nguyen: People always think Bug Bounty is a difficult game, however, in Trava Finance version, it‚Äôs actually just a piece of cake. Because the objective of this Bug Bounty is to invite the community to join a hand in strengthening Trava Finance, the program is set with straightforward rules: üó° If you find any bugs related to the User interface (UI), Logical Flow, and Security, please let us know with a detailed description üó°. The bug can be realized easily by anyone, even non-IT people. To make it easier for you to understand, let‚Äôs go through some examples of each bug type: ‚û°Ô∏è User interface (UI): * Broken or Misaligned Buttons: Buttons are not properly aligned or are overlapping with other elements, making them difficult to click or use. * Invisible Text: Text is the same color as the background, making it impossible to read. * Elements Not Scaling Properly on Different Devices: The design does not adapt to different screen sizes (e.g., mobile vs. desktop ‚Äî Macos, Windows, ‚Ä¶), causing elements to look distorted or disappear. ‚Ä¶ ‚û°Ô∏è Logical Flow: * Incorrect Calculation Results: The app performs incorrect calculations or logic processing. * Incorrect Date or Time Logic: The countdown system of the vault is wrong or the scheduling system allows users to choose the date/time in the past. ‚Ä¶ ‚û°Ô∏è Security Issue * Insufficient Authorization Checks: The app does not properly check user permissions, allowing users to access or perform actions they shouldn‚Äôt be able to. * Smart contract vulnerability. There are a lot of cases of the issues that can be found on the bug bounty program, although our quality assurance is working hard. Third Question: Now let‚Äôs recap what has Trava achieved so far in 2024 before moving on. Please Mr. Minh, do you have anything to share? Mr. Minh Nguyen: Yes, the overview roadmap, I have just mentioned above, now we have the concrete plan. By August 2024, Trava has witnessed strong growth in product development and active community campaigns. In terms of Trava products, we‚Äôve introduced some outstanding features and updates: * Trava Station has been completed: Routes for most actions in tramlines, token transferring in Freight, History & Manage sections, and auto swap in Junction, analysis in Recommendation. * The beginning of 2024 marked the initiation of TravaGPT. Over half of the year, it has grown rapidly to V3.0, supporting both Web3 questions and DeFi actions on Trava Finance. Here you can see the news summarization. * autoCompound Staking was launched to help automate the process of re-staking your rewards from Trava Vault for compound benefits. Regarding community campaigns, Trava successfully attracted many participants in prominent events: * TravaGPT V3.0‚Äôs Incentive Campaign kicked off with greater rewards than ever. * The Thread Contest has attracted an impressive number of participants. * Successful programs in the partnership with Centic: -> Referral Event -> Reputation Showcase I think we have many things to share, and discuss around the features and event! Information about Upcoming Activities and Product Releases Fourth Question: 2024 still has 1/3 left. So will Trava round out the year with exciting new product launches, Mr. Thang? Mr. Thang Nguyen: Yeah sure, Our team is always delivering new things. We have a good team in terms of research and product development. It will not be only on BNB Chain and Ethereum but also on other ecosystems, like Arbitrum, or TON, maybe. Let‚Äôs wait for the next big thing, very promising! Fifth Question: Could you provide more details about the future development of TravaGPT? Trava is placing a strong emphasis on this product, Please Mr. Minh. Mr. Minh Nguyen: TravaGPT is on the way for massive updates! It‚Äôs the main target of us now. By the end of this year, we‚Äôll be launching a Telegram version of TravaGPT, offering users real-time support anytime, anywhere. This will make TravaGPT even more accessible and responsive. In the far future, we expect to enhance the intelligence of TravaGPT, allowing it to give precise recommendations and predictions for each user. Of course, news summarization is also another important feature of TravaGPT in the next months. As I said, TravaGPT is one of the two ways to interact with Trava Dapp in the near future! Sixth Question: What about marketing and media activities? Do you have any plans for the rest of 2024? Mr. Thang Nguyen: Well, Trava is on track for marketing initiatives in the 3rd and 4th quarters of this year. We‚Äôre excited to roll out various programs through KOLs, reputable media, and targeted advertising.', 'TRAVA.FINANCE (or TRAVA) is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending. A detailed and technical description can be found in the whitepaper. If you need development support, join the Technical on Telegram. Last updated 3 years ago Was this helpful?']

After that, your wallet notification will appear as below: Enter the number of assets that you want to deposit in the box ‚ÄúAmount‚Äù Make sure you check all the current and updated information. Notes: Click ‚ÄúSee transaction detail‚Äù to review your transaction.']
RetrievedResults: ['How to deposit? : Access to https://app.trava.finance Connect your wallet. Make sure that you are on the BSC network (If not, you will need to reconnect) Select the asset you that you want to deposit from the available options Select the deposit button on the left and input the amount of the asset you want to stake Approve the transaction in your wallet. My earning: Your earning depends on your depositing amount. The greater the amount, the greater the earning you get. The APY ratios for each type of asset are shown on the dashboard of the staking site, you can follow it anytime. Is there a limited amount to deposit/stake? : There is no limitation for minimum or maximum amount, you can deposit any amount you want. But we mention that you should consider when depositing a very small amount. Because for a really small amount, the transaction costs of the depositing process can be higher than your expected earnings. How to withdraw? : To withdraw you just need to Click the ‚ÄúWithdraw‚Äù button on the vault in the dashboard. Select the amount to withdraw and submit the transaction. PreviousIntroduction to TravaNextBorrowing Last updated 2 years ago Was this helpful?', 'Register **Registration Error** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', 'Login √ó **Login Unsuccessful** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', '2024 Overview of Trava Finance Ecosystem: Published in 5 min readAug 28, 2024 Share In the ever-growing process, Trava has introduced many new products and updates in 2024, such as TravaGPT, Trava Station, etc. To help you easily navigate through our current ecosystem, we provide a detailed overview of Trava Finance in 2024. The overview of Trava ecosystem At present, Trava Finance aims to become an AI-driven Lending Station that provides cross-chain lending pools and other financial services, empowered by AI technology and automation. With that being said, we want to bring users the most convenience in the DeFi space and complete decentralization in Web3. Currently, there are 6 major products in Trava Finance: 1Ô∏è‚É£ TravaGPT : An AI chatbot of Trava. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Station : A hub that brings together the short ways to use all Trava products. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Smart Wallet: an advanced crypto wallet for Web3 users. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Lending Market : A marketplace protocol providing user-owned lending pools. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Staking : A staking protocol to deposit $TRAVA, $rTRAVA or $BNB to earn interest. 6Ô∏è‚É£ Trava Governance : A governance system, allowing users to vote for major decisions of Trava. Let‚Äôs dive into our ecosystem in this article! TravaGPT TravaGPT is an AI chat tool developed by Trava team that helps enhance user experience and navigate our DeFi products more easily. After a process of development, TravaGPT has reached version 3.0 , incorporating more powerful functions than a mere chatbot. With TravaGPT, you just need to tell it what you want to know or to do, it will provide you not only useful information but also complete the actions for you. Currently, it has 3 major features: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Ask anything in Web3 2Ô∏è‚É£ Talk anywhere on Trava 3Ô∏è‚É£ Support DeFi actions in pools or vaults on Trava Finance Feature highlights of TravaGPT TravaGPT will soon be available on Telegram, a popular platform among Web3 enthusiasts. By expanding to Telegram, we aim to offer users a more convenient way to access TravaGPT and a more user-friendly interface. Trava Station Trava Station serves as a center of Trava Finance, aiming to help users in the Trava ecosystem have a more comfortable experience, saving them time and money when making transactions. With Trava Station, instead of having to move between dApps and platforms to perform actions, you can combine them all together in one transaction. The user experience will be increased as you can reduce interaction time and gas costs compared to when doing separate actions. Let‚Äôs see how you can aggregate multiple actions in one transaction and how much gas fees you can save in the picture below. Save more with Trava Station At present, Trava Station has 6 features: ‚û°Ô∏è Freight : Allows users to execute the sequence of actions according to their own demands. ‚û°Ô∏è Tramlines : Provides a list of pre-made shortcuts to do common actions. ‚û°Ô∏è Junction : Allow users to pre-set transactions to be auto-executed when the conditions are met. ‚û°Ô∏è Portfolio : A real-time report that keeps track of all your activities and assets in Trava Station. ‚û°Ô∏è Analytics : Get real-time analysis of the market as well as user preference in Trava Finance. ‚û°Ô∏è Recommendations : Provide a thorough analysis and prediction of DEXs‚Äô parameters. Smart Wallet Smart Wallet is an advanced digital tool that relies on smart contracts, which are only created and owned by the user. Setting apart from other normal wallets, it eliminates the need for private keys or seed phrases. Using a smart wallet offers more advantages for users: * Save fees and streamline transaction process : They enable a smoother DeFi experience by combining multiple transactions into one, reducing transaction fees. * Enhanced user experience and privacy : Smart Wallets offer convenience while improving security, appealing to both new and experienced users by utilizing smart contracts to reduce dependence on private keys. * Additional features and security : Smart Wallets can support multi-signature transactions, add extra layers of security through app authentication, limit daily transaction amounts, and prevent potential errors or theft. Smart Wallet is incorporated in Trava Station and TravaGPT to optimize DeFi actions for users in Trava Finance. Specifically, with Trava Station, your assets are temporarily moved to a Smart Wallet to execute all your actions in a single transaction, making the process smoother. After the actions are completed, your assets are returned to your main wallet (like Metamask or Trust Wallet). To have your own Smart Wallet, you just need to connect your wallet to Trava Finance and go to the Freight tab of Trava Station to create it. Trava Lending Market This is the first lending market that allows users to not only deposit, and borrow assets, but also create and manage their own lending pools. Trava lending system consists of the Trava lending pool and 7 user-owned pools. Trava pool supports around 10 types of assets across 2 different blockchains ( BSC and Ethereum ), while the user-owned pools offer limitless possibilities based on user creativity and specific needs. The lending pools on Trava Lending Market Trava Staking This is a staking protocol that allows users to deposit Trava Finance‚Äôs tokens ($TRAVA/ $rTRAVA) and BNB Chain‚Äôs token ($BNB). Users will then receive corresponding rewards based on their deposit and annual percentage rate (APR) of the staking vaults. Currently, there are three available vaults in Trava Staking which are shown in the picture below. The available staking vaults of Trava Finance Trava Governance Trava Finance also aims to apply the DAO model to the entire system with , which allows users to propose and vote on changes to the ecosystem. Users can stake their TRAVA, rTRAVA, TRAVA/BNB for a period of time and receive veTRAVA ‚Äî voting power, which can be exchanged on veTRAVA Marketplace. The mechanism of Trava Governance ** About Trava.Finance ** Trava Finance is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending, currently on the way to become an AI-driven Lending Station. We provide both lending pools like normal approaches, and a more flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own pools. Applying AI technology and automation to our products, Trava Finance aims to bring users the most convenience in the DeFi space and complete decentralization in Web3. Trava Finance is deployed on the Binance Smart Chain and allows for lending with BSC tokens first; we then enable cross-chain lending with various tokens on Ethereum and other blockchain networks. PreviousIntroduction to TravaNextBorrowing Last updated 2 years ago Was this helpful?', 'Login √ó **Login Unsuccessful** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', 'This is a form of Knight NFT and TRAVA staking, aiming to reduce the impact of inflation on long-term holders in the ecosystem. : Requirements: To be able to participate in Dilution Staking, you must have the following: * TRAVA tokens to stake * Trava Knights: - Knight NFTs V2 - Limited Knight Note!! Knights V1 will not be accepted, so please Trade-up them or buy Armoury Chests V2 and assemble your Knights. Mechanism: : Knight Rarities Each Knight of a rarity has a different power rating, and maximum amount TRAVA to join a Limited Knight Battlefield. Knight Power rating Max lock on limited (TRAVA) Fee (TRAVA) Copper 1.6 10,000 500 Silver 4.4 500,000 1,320 Gold 1,000,000 3,600 Diamond 28.88 5,000,000 8,667 Crystal 280 Unlimited 84,000 : Army sizes * Each army size requires a minimum power rate and Knights of specific rarities, allowing a different maximum amount of TRAVA staked. Army Power rating Maximum stake Squad 100,000 Platoon 1,000,000 Company 350 Unlimited * For example with Medium Battlefield, a Platoon requires minimum Power Rating of 75, and Knight rarities of Copper, Silver, Gold and Diamond. The maximum amount of TRAVA can be staked is 1,000,000 TRAVA. : Lock time The longer the lock time, the higher the dilution percentage will be. Time Lock Dilution 6 Months 15.9% 1 Year 38% 1.5 Year 68.5% 2 Years 100% : Retention rate It will be calculated according to the ratio of TRAVA deposit to the amount of TRAVA circulating in the market. So when you deposit your TRAVA, all stakes will be snapshotted, ensuring your benefits are fixed at the moment of entry. For example, if a user deposits 1 million TRAVA and the total amount of TRAVA in circulation at the moment is 1 billion, then the retention rate will be 0.1%. : Actions * Users can only deposit the first time. * During the locking period, users can extend the lock time for the NFTs. Utilities: Protect long-term holders in the community against inflation, by lowering the risks when the price of TRAVA decreases. Stake rights can be exchanged like NFTs. Proof of stake can be sold on Trava Marketplace. PreviousTreasure MapNextFuture Scope Last updated 1 year ago', 'Trava Mini-Game Series: Published in 3 min readAug 25, 2022 Share Introduction To Fortune Mining To provide users with more services in the Trava Ecosystem, we have planned to implement the Trava minigame series. After the Trava Lottery and Battlehand, the next game ‚Äî Fortune Mining, will be soon published on September 8th 2022. Introduction to fortune mining What is Fortune Mining? As mentioned, this is an important component of the Trava Minigame Series. The game is built on the well-known blockchain idea of the No-loss-rewards game, allowing participants to earn big prizes without worrying about losing their money. How does it work? So how exactly does Fortune Mining work? For more details, users first need to deposit their money into the Fortune Mining Pool. All the rewards from the total deposit will then be distributed to a certain number of lucky users. The more money they deposit, the more chances they will be chosen (based on our algorithm). That means instead of distributing for all users (based on their deposit amount) as a normal lending pool, the total rewards will be spent to be one big prize for the lucky ones. The benefit Fortune Mining brings to players. _No loss to worry about_: As the old saying goes, ‚ÄúMore risk brings higher return.‚Äù However, with Fortune Mining, players will not need to worry about their losses. Because of the unique mechanism, there will be no loss, and unlucky players can get their deposits back after a certain period. _Big prize to look for_: While there is no loss to be concerned about, the winner may earn significantly more benefits than they would if they had deposited into the regular pool. For example , assuming that we run a Fortune Mining pool for users to deposit DAI and gain 20.000 DAI in total deposited after one week. With APY at 1.5% (that is converted to APR at about 0,92%) and APR at 4.08%, respectively, two weeks later, the total reward for the winner will be calculated as: _20000 (0.92%+ 4.08%)/365 14 = 38.356 DAI._ That means if you deposit 100 DAI at first and become the lucky one, you will receive about $38,356 (the interest rate at about 1000%) instead of $0,19 (the interest rate at about 5%). As in the example above, the gap between the rewards you could get in a normal pool and the Fortune Mining pool is very significant. For that reason, this mini-game will be a good choice for those with small capital to try their luck and get much more money than usual. To sum up, what do you need to do to attain the benefits? Step 1. Deposit your token into the Fortune Mining Pool Step 2. Waiting for a certain period (depending on each campaign) Step 3 . Check the result: * If you are the lucky one: Congratulations, you get all the rewards from the pool * If you have not been lucky yet, don‚Äôt worry, you can withdraw your deposit or keep them in the pool, then try your luck in the next period. Notes: We will soon run a voting snapshot for our community to decide which asset should be put in the Fortune Mining pool. Stay tuned for that. About TRAVA.FINANCE Trava.Finance is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending. While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, TRAVA offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business. Based on the Knowledge Graph, Trava performs blockchain data analysis to enhance user experience, increase profit and decrease risks for all users. Credit Score Evaluation is the first analysis that Trava.Finance focuses on and deploys. Question: What is the maximum amount can I borrow?
GroundTruths: ['The maximum amount you can borrow depends on your deposited value and the available liquidity. Please notice the health factor and liquidation threshold indicators to guarantee your collaterals are in the state of safety. Besides, you can not borrow if there is not enough liquidity or if your health factor is too low.']
RetrievedResults: ['Login √ó **Login Unsuccessful** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', 'Is Borrowing assets more beneficial than Selling? : If you sell your assets, you will lose the possession of this particular asset. It means you would be no longer entitled to the potential upside value gain. Whereas, by borrowing, you can still obtain these potential earnings (working capital) without losing your asset. You can borrow when unexpected expenses happen and leverage your holding assets for other investment opportunities. How to borrow? : In order to borrow, you need to deposit any asset to be used as collateral first (check out the Depositing & Earning FAQ section for more info). After depositing, you simply go to the ‚ÄúBorrow‚Äù section and click the ‚ÄúBorrow‚Äù button on the asset you want to borrow. Input the amount and approve the transaction. The borrowed amount is based on the available deposits that you used as collateral. What is the maximum amount can I borrow? : The maximum amount you can borrow depends on your deposited value and the available liquidity. Please notice the health factor and liquidation threshold indicators to guarantee your collaterals are in the state of safety. Besides, you can not borrow if there is not enough liquidity or if your health factor is too low. What type of asset do I repay my loans? : When repaying a loan, the type of asset that you need to repay is in the same asset you borrowed. For example, if you borrow 1 BNB you will pay back 1 BNB plus interest accrued. Another way to pay back the loan is using your collateral. If you want to pay back the loan based on USD price you can borrow any of the available stable coins as USDC, DAI, USDT, etc. How much interest would I pay for my loans? : When borrowing, the interest rate you need to pay depends on the borrowing rate which is determined from the supply and demand ratio of the asset. Moreover, the interest rate is a variable rate so that it changes constantly. The current borrowing rate of your borrowed assets is shown in the Borrowing section of your dashboard, you can check it any time. What is Health factor? : Health factor is an indicator which is used to evaluate the level of safety of your collateral assets against the borrowed assets and its underlying value. You should keep this indicator as high as possible because the higher the value is, the safer your loans are against liquidation scenarios. The liquidation of your deposits will be triggered if the health factor reaches 1. And if the health factor is below 1, your collateral can be liquidated. The health factor is determined depending on the liquidation threshold of your collateral against your borrowed funds. What is the meaning of health factor fluctuation? : The health factor increases or decreases depending on the value fluctuation of your deposited amount. Your health factor increases is a positive indicator, it will improve your borrow position and protect your collateral far from being liquidated. In the case the health factor reduces, it means the value of your collateral assets against the borrowed assets also reduces, it can result in a risk of liquidation of your collaterals. When do I need to repay the loan? : As long as you maintain your health factor safe, you can borrow for an undefined period. There is no fixed time period to pay back the loan. However, the accrued interest of your borrowing will grow day by day, making your health factor decrease. When it reaches the threshold of liquidation, your deposited assets are more likely to fall into liquidation status. How to repay the loan? : In order to pay back the loan you go to the Borrowings section of your dashboard and click on the repay button for the asset you borrowed and want to repay. Select the amount to pay back and approve the transaction. Question: How can I borrow on Trava?

Connect your wallet and select the network that you want. Step 3. Click an asset that you want to borrow  Step 4. Click ‚ÄúBorrow‚Äù  Step 5. After that, your wallet notification will appear as below: Enter the number of assets that you want to borrow in the box ‚ÄúAmount‚Äù Make sure you check all the current and updated information. RetrievedResults: ['Register **Registration Error** √ó Looks like your connection to Trava Forum was lost, please wait while we try to reconnect.', "Brief description of Trava: TRAVA is the world‚Äôs first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending. While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, TRAVA offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business. TRAVA also offers the credit score function based on financial data on-chain analysis as a useful tool that reduces risk and increases profits for all users. We build our solutions on TRAVA.FINANCE whose smart contracts are deployed on BSC network, so the speed of transactions, gas fees, and robustness depend on BSC network. However, in the near future, we will allow cross-chain lending in our platform. Please join the the Trava team and members of the community look forward to helping you understand and use Trava. Why should we trust Trava? : Trava Protocol has been audited and secured internally, by third parties (Hacken, Certik) and even Community Checks. Check https://docs.trava.finance/security/ for more information. How to interconnect with Trava protocol? : In order to interconnect with Trava protocol, you need to deposit your asset into lending pools. After depositing, you will earn passive income, this income is based on the market borrowing demand. Additionally, you can also borrow by using your deposited assets as collateral. Do I need to pay fees to interconnect with Trava protocol? : Interacting with the protocol requires transactions and so transaction fees for BSC Blockchain usage, which depend on the network status and transaction complexity. Where are my deposited tokens stored? : After depositing, your deposit funds are stored in a smart contract. The code of the smart contract is public, open-source, formally verified, and audited by third-party auditors. You can withdraw your funds from the pool back to your wallet. What does Trava do to avoid risk? : Risk can occur in smart contracts not only on BSC but also on other networks. To ensure the safe, we have several strategies as follows: * Auditing code performed by third parties: we have been audited by Hacken and Certik. We are contacting others. * Audit internally our code. We have a strong team with high-security skills. * Community check: we will organize hackathon events and reward programs that encourage the community to detect risks. What are the TRAVA token and its utility? : We issue TRAVA tokens based on Binance smart chain's BEP-20 standard; the total supply is 5 billion. These TRAVA tokens can be used in: * Reward: Pool owners can set up rewards paid by TRAVA token. Thus, lending pool depositors will earn rewards by TRAVA token. * Collateral and lending: Users can use TRAVA as mortgages. The users also loan TRAVA. * Payment for lending fees: Users can pay pool lending fees by TRAVA. * Payment for pool management: Pool owners can pay for the pool creation, update (e.g., pool parameters, add/remove tokens, ‚Ä¶), and pause by TRAVA. * Payment for auction deposits: in the NFTs auction process, TRAVA can be used as a locked asset. * Payment for auction organization: To perform all auction actions for NFT, the NFT‚Äôs owners (auction organizers) can pay the auction fees by TRAVA. * Staking for a data validator: To store credit data stored on the knowledge graph chain, the data must be confirmed by validators. The process is built up to eliminate redundant, unnecessary, and insecure data. The knowledge graph data validators stake by TRAVA. * Staking to participate in the governance process: TRAVA.FINANCE will become a community solution, thus the TRAVA.FINANCE‚Äôs rules are elected by participants, who hold TRAVA‚Äôs token. Tokenomics? : Documentation on tokenomics and governance is available in the White Paper Does Trava have a Mobile App? : Be careful, we don‚Äôt provide any downloaded applications for mobile. Trava also never carries advertisements on any social media or search engine. Please stay away from those adverts if you see, it is a scam. In addition, Trava Protocol would not ask for your seed passphrase ever. Chart: Go to dextool: **** Is there any group where I can discuss about price of Trava? : If you want to discuss about prices, or any information related to trading, please join the following group: Trava Road map: You can find the Road map on website of Trava: https://trava.finance/roadmap Where can I get more information and resources of Trava? : Feel free to refer to the White Paper for a deeper dive into Trava Protocol mechanisms. For example, if you borrow 1 BNB you will pay back 1 BNB plus interest accrued. Another way to pay back the loan is using your collateral. If you want to pay back the loan based on USD price you can borrow any of the available stable coins as USDC, DAI, USDT, etc. How much interest would I pay for my loans? : When borrowing, the interest rate you need to pay depends on the borrowing rate which is determined from the supply and demand ratio of the asset. Moreover, the interest rate is a variable rate so that it changes constantly. The current borrowing rate of your borrowed assets is shown in the Borrowing section of your dashboard, you can check it any time. What is Health factor? : Health factor is an indicator which is used to evaluate the level of safety of your collateral assets against the borrowed assets and its underlying value. You should keep this indicator as high as possible because the higher the value is, the safer your loans are against liquidation scenarios. The liquidation of your deposits will be triggered if the health factor reaches 1. And if the health factor is below 1, your collateral can be liquidated. The health factor is determined depending on the liquidation threshold of your collateral against your borrowed funds. What is the meaning of health factor fluctuation? : The health factor increases or decreases depending on the value fluctuation of your deposited amount. Your health factor increases is a positive indicator, it will improve your borrow position and protect your collateral far from being liquidated. In the case the health factor reduces, it means the value of your collateral assets against the borrowed assets also reduces, it can result in a risk of liquidation of your collaterals. When do I need to repay the loan? : As long as you maintain your health factor safe, you can borrow for an undefined period. There is no fixed time period to pay back the loan. However, the accrued interest of your borrowing will grow day by day, making your health factor decrease. When it reaches the threshold of liquidation, your deposited assets are more likely to fall into liquidation status. How to repay the loan? : In order to pay back the loan you go to the Borrowings section of your dashboard and click on the repay button for the asset you borrowed and want to repay. Select the amount to pay back and approve the transaction. PreviousStaking/Depositing & EarningNextTesting Trava Last updated 2 years ago Was this helpful?']

The Utilisation Rate determines the borrow interest rates. : Each token in each Pool has a utilization rate at each time , which is defined by the ratio =/U_t = L_t/A_twhere represents total borrows and represents total liquidity. This ratio regulates how much of a deposited token is used in the market. When this ratio approaches 100%, there will be a scarcity of tokens in the Pool. The borrower will be unable to borrow at this time, and the lender will be unable to withdraw funds from the Pool. To avoid this, interest rate and risk parameters must be calculated in precise detail for each token. Interest Rate Model: Interest Rate Model tends to be a cost-effective way for the Pool to run itself. The parameters of the pool will aid in the adjustment of borrow and deposit rates to a balanced and reasonable point. In practice, numerous models are used: linear rate, non-linear rate, and kinked rate. The kinked rate model is used in the Trava protocol. As with the non-linear model, such models have the virtue of significantly shifting the incentives for borrowers and lenders beyond some usage level. In contrast to non-linear models without a kink, they also introduce a point of abrupt change in the interest rate, beyond which interest rates begin to sharply rise. The kinked model is based on several parameters and is described as follows. Firstly, the ratio optimal utilization rate UoptimalU_\\text{optimal}Uoptimal\u200b is a parameter that determines the best-fit utilization rate for the protocol. It varies from token to token and depends on the risk and volatility of the token. For example, it could be 80% for stable tokens like DAI, or just 65% for unstable coins like LINK. Next, the interest rate is a function that varies based on utilization rate. Three parameters are used to define this function: (1) Initial rate , (2) the constant Rslope1R_\\text{slope1}Rslope1\u200b is used when UoptimalU_t < U_\\text{optimal}Uoptimal\u200b, and (3) the constant Rslope2R_\\text{slope2}Rslope2\u200b is used when ‚â•UoptimalU_t \\geq U_\\text{optimal}Uoptimal\u200b. Specifically, the interest rate is defined by: * If UoptimalU_t <U_\\text{optimal}Uoptimal\u200b then =+Uoptimal√óRslope1R_t = R_0 + \\frac{U_t}{U_\\text{optimal}} \\times R_\\text{slope1}Uoptimal\u200b\u200b√óRslope1\u200b * If ‚â•UoptimalU_t \\geq U_\\text{optimal}Uoptimal\u200b then =+Rslope1+‚àíUoptimal1‚àíUoptimal√óRslope2R_t= R_0 + R_\\text{slope1} + \\frac{ U_t - U_\\text{optimal}}{1 -U_\\text{optimal}} \\times R_\\text{slope2}Rslope1\u200b+1‚àíUoptimal\u200b‚àíUoptimal\u200b\u200b√óRslope2\u200b The interest rates have a kink in them: they sharply change at a certain point. A variety of protocols use interest rates like this, including Aave and Compound. As users mint, redeem, borrow, repay, or liquidate tokens, the interest rate changes with the utilization rate . As a result, it's also known as a variable interest rate. Interest rate parameters in Trava protocol: Token Uoptimal Base Slope1 Slope2 DAI 80% 75% USDC 90% 60% USDT 90% 60% ETH 65% 100% BNB 65% 10% 100% BUSD 80% 100% BTCB 65% 100% AAVE 65% 100% ADA 65% 100% CAKE 65% 100% XRP 65% 100% DOGE 60% 150% DOT 65% 100% XVS 65% 100% FTM 65% 100% Borrow rate: The borrow rate is calculated using the current interest rate(per year) and is updated every second. That is, borrowers will be charged interest that changes every second. He must pay more interest if the Utilisation Rate is higher, and vice versa. Mathematically, at each time t, the Borrow rate (per second) is =/YB_t = R_t/Y where Y=31536000Y= 3153600031536000 is the number of seconds in a year. If the user is currently borrowing tokens then the interest payable is √óT_t \\times B_t . The interest payable is accrued to the loan in the next second, that is T=(1+)T_{t+1}=T_t(1+B_t) . Deposit rate: Deposit rate and Borrow rate are closely linked. Precisely, at each time , deposit rate is determined based on Utilization Rate and borrow rate and reserve factor . Precisely, deposit rate is defined by =√ó√ó(1‚àír)D_t = U_t \\times B_t\\times (1-r). In terms of probability, is probability that each token is borrowed, thus is the average value of interest earned from each token deposited into the Pool. For deposit, the calculation of interest is updated after each operation deposit, withdraw, borrow, repay.", 'Application error: a client-side exception has occurred (see the browser console for more information). :']
